DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether levonorgestrel-releasing intrauterine system effective decrease menstrual blood loss .
DOC.brief_title: Study Women With Idiopathic Menorrhagia Determine Reduction Menstrual Blood Loss ( MBL ) After Treatment With Levonorgestrel-releasing Intrauterine System ( IUS )

Schering AG , Germany . Berlex , Inc. rename Bayer HealthCare Pharmaceuticals , Inc. , Schering AG Germany rename Bayer HealthCare AG , Germany .
DOC.criteria: Women > /= 80 mL blood loss menstrual cycle desire contraception Post menopausal menstrual cycle < 21 day > 35 day Pregnancy
